mapper.select: SELECT id, username, name, school, email, studentID, createTime, updateTime, school, status FROM `user` where `username` = #{username};
SELECT id, username, name, school, email, studentID, createTime, updateTime, school, status FROM `user` where `id` = #{userId};
SELECT id, username, name, school, email, studentId, createTime, updateTime, school, status FROM `user` where `username` = #{username} or `studentId` = #{studentId};
mapper.insert: insert into `user`(username, password, studentId, name, email) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{studentId}, #{name}, #{email})
mapper.select: SELECT role.id as roleId, role.`name` as roleName, role.sn as roleSn FROM user_role, `user`, role WHERE user_role.role_id = role.id and user_role.user_id = `user`.id AND `user`.id = #{userId}

SELECT id, username, name, email, createTime, updateTime,school,status FROM user WHERE 1=1
AND id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{id}, '%')
AND username LIKE CONCAT('%', #{username}, '%')
AND name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
AND email LIKE CONCAT('%', #{email}, '%')
SELECT `user`.* FROM `user`, role, user_role WHERE `user`.id = user_role.user_id AND role.id = user_role.role_id AND role_id = #{roleId}
